mapper.select: select t.CONTRACT_NO as contractNo, t.PLAN_ACCOUNT as planAccount, (select sum(m.ACCOUNT) from t_fix_tender_detail m where m.FIX_BORROW_ID=(select n.id from t_fix_borrow n where n.CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo})) as sumAccount from t_fix_borrow t where t.CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo}
SELECT USER_ID, SUM(ACCOUNT) AS SUMACCOUNT, SUM(DRAW_MONEY) AS SUMDRAWMONEY , SUM(NO_DRAW_MONEY) AS SUMNODRAWMONEY FROM T_FIX_TENDER_DETAIL WHERE FIX_BORROW_ID = #{fixBorrowId} GROUP BY USER_ID
